meanings: (허깨비) ghost, phantom, vision, (formal) apparition, (literary) phantasm, (literary) specter

examples.korean: You are most welcome to my humble abode. 발음듣기 누추한 제 집에 오신 것을 진심으로 환영합니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You are most welcome to my humble abode. 발음

examples.korean: crowds waiting on/at the quayside to welcome them 발음듣기 그들을 환영하기 위해 부둣가에서 기다리는 사람들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: crowds waiting on/at the quayside to welcome them 발음

examples.korean: The team members were greeted like conquering heroes. 발음듣기 그 팀원들은 정복 영웅들 같은 환영을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The team members were greeted like conquering heroes. 발음

examples.korean: He discerned a certain coldness in their welcome. 발음듣기 그는 그들이 자신을 환영하는 태도가 약간 냉랭한 것을 감지했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He discerned a certain coldness in their welcome. 발음

examples.korean: The new manager has been hailed as the saviour of the club. 발음듣기 그 새 감독은 그 클럽의 구원자로 환영 받아 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The new manager has been hailed as the saviour of the club. 발음
